```{r, setup}
library("tidyverse")
library("readxl")
```

```{r, reading_lobby_data}
file <- "../lobby/BB.DD. LOBBY 2_ (1).xlsx"
sheets <- readxl::excel_sheets(file)
labby_data <- lapply(sheets, function(X) {
  result <- readxl::read_excel(file, sheet = X)
  result$month <- X
  result
})
combine_sheets <- do.call("rbind", labby_data)
```

```{r, reading_words_data}
file <- "../lobby/keywords - etiquetas - Sheet1.csv"
words_data <- read_csv(file)
```
